Award Winning Discovery

Join Our Exclusive Craft Beer Club

The Flavourly Craft Beer Club is the ultimate monthly delivery for any real beer enthusiast and we like to keep things simple!

Our expert team carefully curates our beer boxes with the best craft beers from small independent breweries and pack them up once a month just for you.

Discover a beer festival in a box!

 8 Craft beers per month
 Includes a handful of complementary snacks
 Comes with “Meet the Brewers” product guide
 2 x £10 gift vouchers for friends and family
 Refer friends and earn credit!
 Same day dispatch for speedy delivery nationwide

JOIN NOW

  •  Delivered nationwide
